    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Telephone_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Telephone_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Telephone areaCityCode="202" countryAccessCode="01" extension="237" id="telephone_1" phoneNumber="5555555" role="Home" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "TelephoneSummary" : {
    "role" : "Home",
    "countryAccessCode" : "01",
    "areaCityCode" : "202",
    "phoneNumber" : "5555555",
    "extension" : "237",
    "id" : "telephone_1"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        countryAccessCode
        Code assigned by telecommunications authorities for international country access identifier.
        Details
        Type TelephoneCountryAccessCode
        Example Value 01
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9]{1,3}
        Max Occurrences 1
        areaCityCode
        Code assigned for telephones in a specific region, city, or area.
        Details
        Type TelephoneAreaCityCode
        Example Value 202
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9]{1,8}
        Max Occurrences 1
        phoneNumber
        Telephone number assigned to a single location.
        Details
        Type TelephoneNumber
        Example Value 5555555
        Required true
        Pattern [0-9]{7,20}
        Max Occurrences 1
        extension
        Extension to reach a specific party at the phone number.
        Details
        Type TelephoneExtension
        Example Value 237
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9]{1,5}
        Max Occurrences 1
        id
        Used elsewhere in the message to reference a specific telephone number (including faxes).
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:ID
        Example Value telephone_1
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
